tool_description: Provides a random conversation starter question on each request
name: Fast Conversation Starter Questions
title: Fast Conversation Starter Questions

api_list.name: Get Question
api_list.description: Gets a random conversation starter question
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-conversation-starter-questions.p.rapidapi.com/getQuestion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-conversation-starter-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-conversation-starter-questions.p.rapidapi.com/getQuestion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-conversation-starter-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
